body_html: @apaszke yes, there are far less torch ops now. I was just mentioning that my PR did not touch the padding code which I named unpacking in my comment. I did something similar for padding. However, having a Function for it might be best.

body: @apaszke yes, there are far less torch ops now. I was just mentioning that my PR did not touch the padding code which I named unpacking in my comment. I did something similar for padding. However, having a Function for it might be best.
